net.floodlightcontroller.util

类 MatchUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.util.MatchUtils

  • public class MatchUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for working with Matches. Includes workarounds for current Loxi limitations/bugs. Convert OFInstructions to and from dpctl/ofctl-style strings. Used primarily by the static flow pusher to store and retreive flow entries.
    作者:
    Ryan Izard Includes string methods adopted from OpenFlowJ for OpenFlow 1.0., David Erickson (daviderickson@cs.stanford.edu), Rob Sherwood (rob.sherwood@stanford.edu)

    • 方法详细资料

      • maskL4AndUp

        public static org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match maskL4AndUp(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match m)
        Create a point-to-point match for two devices at the IP layer. Takes an existing match (e.g. from a PACKET_IN), and masks all MatchFields leaving behind: IN_PORT VLAN_VID ETH_TYPE ETH_SRC ETH_DST IPV4_SRC IPV4_DST IP_PROTO (might remove this) If one of the above MatchFields is wildcarded in Match m, that MatchField will be wildcarded in the returned Match.
        参数:
        m - The match to remove all L4+ MatchFields from
        返回:
        A new Match object with all MatchFields masked/wildcared except for those listed above.

      • convertToVersion

        public static org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match.Builder convertToVersion(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match parent,
                                                                           org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFVersion version)
        Retains all fields in the Match parent. Converts the parent to an equivalent Match of OFVersion version. No polite check is done to verify if MatchFields in parent are supported in a Match of OFVersion version. An exception will be thrown if there are any unsupported fields during the conversion process. Note that a Match.Builder is returned. This is a convenience for cases where MatchFields might be modified, added, or removed prior to being built (e.g. in Forwarding/Routing between switches of different OFVersions). Simply build the returned Match.Builder if you would like to treat this function as a strict copy-to-version.
        参数:
        parent, - the Match to convert
        version, - the OFVersion to convert parent to
        返回:
        a Match.Builder of the newly-converted Match

      • createRetentiveBuilder

        public static org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match.Builder createRetentiveBuilder(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match m)
        Workaround for bug in Loxi: Create a builder from an existing Match object. Unlike Match's createBuilder(), this utility function will preserve all of Match m's MatchFields, even if new MatchFields are set or modified with the builder after it is returned to the calling function. All original MatchFields in m will be set if the build() method is invoked upon the returned builder. After the builder is returned, if a MatchField is modified via setExact(), setMasked(), or wildcard(), the newly modified MatchField will replace the original found in m.
        参数:
        m; - the match to create the builder from
        返回:
        Match.Builder; the builder that can be modified, and when built, will retain all of m's MatchFields, unless you explicitly overwrite them.

      • createForgetfulBuilder

        public static org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match.Builder createForgetfulBuilder(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match m)
        Create a Match builder the same OF version as Match m. The returned builder will not retain any MatchField information from Match m and will essentially return a clean-slate Match builder with no parent history. This simple method is included as a wrapper to provide the opposite functionality of createRetentiveBuilder().
        参数:
        m; - the match to create the builder from
        返回:
        Match.Builder; the builder retains no history from the parent Match m

      • createCopy

        public static org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match createCopy(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match m)
        Create a duplicate Match object from Match m.
        参数:
        m; - the match to copy
        返回:
        Match; the new copy of Match m

      • toString

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String toString(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match match)
        已过时。 
        TODO NOT IMPLEMENTED! (Marked as Deprecated for the time being.) Returns empty string right now. Output a dpctl-styled string, i.e., only list the elements that are not wildcarded. A match-everything Match outputs "Match[]"
        返回:
        "Match[dl_src:00:20:01:11:22:33,nw_src:192.168.0.0/24,tp_dst:80]"

      • fromString

        public static org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match fromString(java.lang.String match,
                                                             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFVersion ofVersion)
                                                                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Based on the method from OFMatch in openflowj 1.0. Set this Match's parameters based on a comma-separated key=value pair dpctl-style string, e.g., from the output of OFMatch.toString(). The exact syntax for each key is defined by the string constants at the top of MatchUtils.java.

        Supported keys/values include

        KEY(s) VALUE
        "in_port" integer
        "eth_src", "eth_dst" hex-string
        "eth_type", "eth_vlan_vid", "eth_vlan_pcp" integer
        "ipv4_src", "ipv4_dst" CIDR-style netmask
        "tp_src","tp_dst", "tcp_src", "tcp_dst", "udp_src", "udp_dst", etc. integer (max 64k)

        The CIDR-style netmasks assume 32 netmask if none given, so: "128.8.128.118/32" is the same as "128.8.128.118"

        参数:
        match - a key=value comma separated string, e.g. "in_port=5,nw_dst=192.168.0.0/16,tp_src=80"
        the - OF version to construct this match for
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on unexpected key or value
